original_title: President to meet ruling faction MPs to discuss domestic debt
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – President Ranil Wickremesinghe will meet with a group of parliamentarians of the ruling faction on Wednesday (28).
The meeting will be held at the President's office at 5 PM on Wednesday (28).
The meeting will focus on Sri Lanka's domestic debt restructuring, according to a senior MP.
Domestic debt restructuring will not affect banking system – President
